Name: 7 Years From Now
About the game: Play as Haruto Soraki, a high schooler in his quest to find the memory he presumably lost in an accident seven years ago. As you begin your journey in your hometown, meet with forgotten friends, uncover the town's dark secrets, and try to piece back together what really happened 7 years ago. KEY FEATURES Slice of life drama with a distinctive Pixel art Navigate in the town and interact with the town folks to progress in the story Investigate mysterious events Uncover secrets about the town Travel in the past to out-think your enemies Unravel the mystery of your memory loss to find out the real truth Supported Languages: English, Italian, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Thai and Indonesian.
